```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r install, eval=3}




```

```{r example}
berlin_mask <- terra::rast("E:/PopDynCloud/GeoData/data-proc/berlin/template-raster_berlin_2018_10m_03035_tif/template-raster_berlin_2018_10m_03035.tif")

berlin_light <- terra::rast("E:/PopDynCloud/GeoData/data-proc/berlin/light-pollution_berlin_2021_100m_03035_tif/light-pollution_berlin_2021_100m_03035.tif")

terra::ext(terra::aggregate(berlin_mask, 10))
terra::ext(terra::disagg(berlin_light, 10))


```
